title: GROUP SINGING - ACAPELLA
description: Music is a part of our everyday lives. From the hammering of our hearts to the shrieking of the cars, it’s within us and around us. Amidst the many catastrophic sounds, will your group’s crooning be crowned the best?
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: The time allotted for setup is 2 minutes.
The performance should not exceed 3 minutes.
A maximum of 5 participants are allowed per team.
Necessary instruments and equipment (including Lead wires) are to be brought by the teams.
A maximum of 3 instruments can be used per team.
Songs containing inappropriate and offensive lyrics will not be allowed.
